TopicTitle: Headset doesnt work when plugged into back jacks

Articles.Content: After realizing the danger of having an easily step-onable setup with my headset plugged into the front jacks, i tried to plug them into the back, but for whatever reason, it doesn't seem to work, any ideas?
Are they enabled? Is audio being routed to them? If you have a Realtek chip open it's control panel thing and it should be simple
Do any other headsets or speakers work?

No other headsets work when plugged into back, and they are enabled, as they work in the from panel.

If you could use a bit more information:

My guess: Busted audio card.

Even if it works out the front? I remember it not working on my last computer, either, so its probably not that
